title: Me and the Girls (Captioned)
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation, Alan Smallcross and Jack Gold
brief_description: George Banks is dying and from his hospital bed he reflects on his colourful, unconventional and at times poignant years as the leader of a travelling troupe of dancing girls. He remembers the good and bad times, his friends and loved ones, especially his one great love, Harry. Set in Switzerland in 1938, this drama is based on the play by Noel Coward. Stars Tom Courtenay as George Banks. Rated: PG.
